summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 78, Lake Union Shore Lands and Block 1, Mercer's Waterfront Addition, being the alley between Westlake Avenue North and 9th Avenue North, from Mercer Street to Roy Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 11193 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
